CustomField.description: Straight line distance from this business location to the Serving Central Office as determined by locating their latitudes and longitudes on a map and computing the distance in miles to 6 decimal places.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Straight line distance from this business location to the Serving Central Office as determined by locating their latitudes and longitudes on a map and computing the distance in miles to 6 decimal places.
CustomField.label: Distance to Central Office
